authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

function.name: function
function.description: The function you want to invoke. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
function.ai_hint: The function you want to invoke. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

qualifier.name: qualifier
qualifier.description: Specify a version or alias to invoke a published version of the function
qualifier.ai_hint: Specify a version or alias to invoke a published version of the function

invocationType.name: invocationType

options.name: Wait for Results
options.description: Invoke the function synchronously and wait for the response

options.name: Continue Workflow
options.description: Invoke the function and immediately continue the workflow

invocationType.description: Specify if the workflow should wait for the function to return the results
invocationType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

payload.name: payload
payload.description: The JSON that you want to provide to your Lambda function as input
payload.ai_hint: The JSON that you want to provide to your Lambda function as input
